channel.title: Need a Banner
channel.description:
Well... I don't really feel like making a banner myself, so I thought that I would see what people here can do. I would like a banner designed for my [url=http://x-cel-psc.com]website[/url].
[b]Text:[/b] X-Cel Private Server Community [b]Dimensions:[/b] 2000px wide, 140px tall [b]Border:[/b] 1px black border on the top and bottom of the banner. No border on the left/right. [b]Extra:[/b] If you go to my website, you should notice a dark-blue bar there. If you could make a new one of those as well to fit the new banner, that would be great. Same width as banner... should be 32px tall. Same border as the banner as well.
If yours is good enough, it may be added to the website. There is no guarantee that it will be though.
-Alexia

item.title: Need a Banner
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion

item.title: Need a Banner
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Well… I don’t really feel like making a banner myself, so I thought that I would see what people here can do. I would like a banner designed for my website.

Text: X-Cel Private Server Community
Dimensions: 2000px wide, 140px tall
Border: 1px black border on the top and bottom of the banner. No border on the left/right.
Extra: If you go to my website, you should notice a dark-blue bar there. If you could make a new one of those as well to fit the new banner, that would be great. Same width as banner… should be 32px tall. Same border as the banner as well.

If yours is good enough, it may be added to the website. There is no guarantee that it will be though.

-Alexia
